batchSetLockup(bytes32[],uint256[]).details: Only callable by the token diamond that owns these lots

extendLockup(bytes32,uint256).details: Only callable by the token diamond that owns this lot

params.newUnlockTime: New unlock time (must be later than current)

returns._0: Seconds remaining until unlock (0 if already unlocked)

processTransfer(address,address,bytes32,.details: OPTIONAL: Only implement if module needs to track stateThis function is called AFTER successful transferIf not implemented, TokenComplianceFacet will ignore call failure

removeLockup(bytes32).details: Only callable by the token diamond that owns this lot

setLockup(bytes32,uint256).details: Only callable by the token diamond that owns this lot

params.unlockTime: Unix timestamp when lot becomes transferable

validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32.details: MUST be view/pure function (called via staticcall)This function is called BEFORE transfer execution

params.lotId: Lot ID being transferred (bytes32(0) for ERC-20 transfers)

returns._0: True if transfer is compliant, false otherwise

batchSetLockup(bytes32[],uint256[]).notice: Batch set lockups for multiple lots

extendLockup(bytes32,uint256).notice: Extend lockup period (can only increase, not decrease)

isLocked(bytes32).notice: Check if a lot is currently locked

lotToToken(bytes32).notice: Tracks which token diamond owns each lot (security)

setLockup(bytes32,uint256).notice: Set lockup period for a lot

validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32.notice: Validate if a transfer is compliant
